lead_paragraph: Grammy Award-winning singer Mariah Carey shrugged off a botched New Year's Eve show in New York's Times Square, telling fans and critics on Sunday that life does not always go as planned.
snippet: Grammy Award-winning singer Mariah Carey shrugged off a botched New Year's Eve show in New York's Times Square, telling fans and critics on Sunday that life does not always go as planned....

headline.main: After New Year's Eve Debacle, Mariah Carey Wishes for 'More Headlines'
headline.print_headline: After New Year's Eve Debacle, Mariah Carey Wishes for 'More Headlines'
